attributes.additional_details:
Is it right that the NHS faces cuts of £8bn?
Is it right that the police face 20% cuts?
When we are paying out £11.5bn to foreign aid ?
Our own people are living below the breadline. Our own people are facing losing their jobs in the NHS and police force .
Don’t let this government get away with giving your money , your taxes to other countries we need to save our own before we can help others.
